ResumeParserData.Experience: Deutsche Bank  Lead Business Analyst  March 2010 - Present  Manchester, UK  Requirements Gathering : Conducted comprehensive requirement gathering sessions with global stakeholders.  Process Improvement : Led initiatives that improved process efficiency by 30%, reducing operational costs.  Data Analysis : Utilized Excel, SQL, and Tableau for complex data analysis to support strategic decisions.  Project Management : Successfully managed numerous projects using both Agile and Waterfall methodologies.  Stakeholder Communication : Maintained effective communication with senior management and project teams.  Compliance and Risk Management : Ensured all projects complied with regulatory standards and internal policies.  Citibank  Senior Business Analyst  July 2005 - February 2010  Manchester, UK  Requirements Gathering : Collaborated with stakeholders to gather and document business requirements.  Process Improvement : Implemented process enhancements that increased efficiency by 20%.  Data Analysis : Conducted detailed data analysis to support business strategies.  Project Management : Managed projects from initiation to completion, ensuring timely delivery.  Stakeholder Communication : Facilitated clear communication between business and technical teams.  Report Generation : Prepared detailed reports and presentations for senior management.  BNP Paribas  Business Analyst  January 2002 - June 2005  Manchester, UK  Requirements Gathering : Assisted in documenting and analyzing business requirements.  Process Improvement : Supported process optimization projects, improving operational efficiency.  Data Analysis : Provided data analysis support to senior analysts.  Project Management : Participated in project planning and execution.  Stakeholder Communication : Communicated effectively with various project stakeholders.

ResumeParserData.Summary: Highly experienced Business Analyst with over 18 years in the financial services industry. Expertise in data analysis, project management, and process optimization. Proven track record in delivering strategic solutions that enhance business performance and stakeholder satisfaction.
ResumeParserData.ExecutiveSummary: Rajesh has an experience in the domain of 'Finance and Insurance', particularly in the sub-domain of 'Business Operations Specialists. The candidate has been working as a Lead Business Analyst at Deutsche Bank for the last 14.5 years.
ResumeParserData.ManagementSummary: Currently, Rajesh holds a Low Management Level position, as Lead Business Analyst at Deutsche Bank. from 01/03/2010 to 15/07/2024. The candidate has a total experience of 14.5 years in this company.
